price: Sa'an nan samã da ƙasã ba su yi kũka *a kansu ba, Kuma ba su kasance waɗanda ake yi wa jinkiri ba.
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ
footnotes: * Watau sama da ƙasa ba su girgizu ba sabõda halaka su da aka yi kamar ba a yi, kõme ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: famā bakat ʿalayhimu al-samāu wal-arḍu wamā kānū munẓarīna
